mapper.select: select del.deliv_id AS deliv_id , del.regdate AS regdate , user.client AS client , pcin.pur_cnt AS pur_cnt from tb_userinfo user join tb_purchaseinfo pcin on user.loginID = pcin.loginID join tb_delivdir del on del.purinf_id = pcin.purinf_id order by del.deliv_id asc LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
select COUNT(deliv_id) from tb_userinfo user join tb_purchaseinfo pcin on user.loginID = pcin.loginID join tb_delivdir del on del.purinf_id = pcin.purinf_id

select del.regdate,user.client,user.loginID,pinfo.pur_cnt,pur.depositYN from tb_delivdir del join tb_purchaseinfo pinfo on pinfo.purinf_id = del.purinf_id join tb_purchase pur on pur.pur_id = pinfo.pur_id join tb_userinfo user on user.loginID = pur.loginID where del.deliv_id = #{deliv_id}
